risk_factors.description: The need for ongoing investments in infrastructure and technology may lead to increased costs that could impact overall profitability.
Potential regulatory actions, such as those from the DOJ, could have unintended consequences for the tech sector and impact business operations.
The company is in a third place position in the cloud market, which may hinder its ability to achieve margins comparable to industry leaders.

strategic_initiatives.progress: Built by a small dedicated team and has become incredibly popular.
strategic_initiatives.impact: Shows significant promise for future growth.

strategic_initiatives.progress: More than a quarter of all new code at Google is generated by AI.
strategic_initiatives.impact: Boosts productivity and efficiency for engineers.

strategic_initiatives.progress: Rolled out to 100 new countries and territories, reaching a billion users.
strategic_initiatives.impact: Increases overall search usage and user satisfaction.

strategic_initiatives.progress: Recently launched ads on mobile in the U.S.

strategic_initiatives.impact: Supports AI efforts and drives efficiencies.

strategic_initiatives.progress: Corporate agreement to purchase nuclear energy from small modular reactors.
strategic_initiatives.impact: Enables up to 500 megawatts of new 24/7 carbon-free power.
